chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.sales.stage.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Sale Stage
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, selection_item.title as _sales_stage FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN meta_select as selection ON selection.name = 'crm.opportunity.sales.stage.select' LEFT JOIN meta_select_item as selection_item ON selection_item.select_id = selection.id WHERE cast(selection_item.value as decimal) = self.sales_stage_select GROUP BY _sales_stage ORDER BY _sales_stage

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.source.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.type.amount.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, opportunity_type.name as _opportunity_type FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN crm_opportunity_type as opportunity_type ON self.opportunity_type = opportunity_type.id GROUP BY _opportunity_type ORDER BY _opportunity_type

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.leadsource.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT count(self.id) AS lead_won, Source.name as _source FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_source as Source ON self.source = Source.id GROUP BY _source ORDER BY _source

chart.name: chart.dashboard.opportunities.won.by.salesman.bar
chart.title: Opportunities By Source
chart.dataset: SELECT SUM(self.amount) AS amount, sales_man.full_name as _sales_man FROM crm_opportunity self LEFT JOIN base_user_info as sales_man ON self.user_info = sales_man.id GROUP BY _sales_man ORDER BY _sales_man
